transcripts.text: Let me ask you something.  What made you what you are?  You had a bad day once on the night.  You had a bad day and everything changed.  One moment you're lost in a carnival of delight.  Next, it takes you somewhere you don't want to be.  Somewhere dark and cold, filled with the damp, ambiguous shapes of things you'd rather forget.  You're going mad.  So when you find yourself locked onto an unpleasant train of thought, remember this.  There's always hands.
